RelativeLayout:
<TextClock android:id="@+id/time" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:format12Hour="h:mm" android:format24Hour="H:mm" android:textSize="64sp" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="@font/HarmonyOS_Sans_Black" tools:text="10:05" />
<TextClock android:id="@+id/date" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_below="@id/time" android:format12Hour="MM/dd EEEa" android:format24Hour="MM/dd EEE" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="#B0BEC5" android:fontFamily="@font/HarmonyOS_Sans_Black" tools:text="10/7 周六下午" />
